body.name: TCL 75-Inch Class S4 4K LED Smart TV with Fire TV (75S450F, 2023 Model), Dolby Vision HDR, Dolby Atmos, Alexa Built-in, Apple Airplay Compatibility, Streaming UHD Television,Black
features: 4K Ultra HD Resolution – Experience incredible detail with 4X the resolution of 1080p Full HDTVs.
Motion Rate 120 – Motion enhancement technology for improved motion clarity.
HDR PRO (Dolby Vision, HDR10, & HLG) - Enjoy enhanced contrast, accurate colors and fine details utilizing all the most advanced HDR formats.
Dolby Atmos - Enjoy an immersive cinematic experience at home with Dolby Atmos built-in.

Fire TV Experience – All your entertainment in one place. Fire TV gives you quick access to live TV, video games, music, and lets you stream over 1 million movies and TV episodes. Subscriptions may apply.
Auto Game Mode (ALLM) – Automatically enables game mode for the lowest possible input lag and latency for an unmatched gaming performance.
FullView Metal Bezel-less Design - Elegant edge-to-edge glass design for a modern design that blends seamlessly into any home.
3 HDMI Inputs (One with eARC) - Three high-speed HDMI inputs for the best connection to gaming consoles, set-top boxes, AV receiver and more.
AirPlay 2 – Share videos, photos, music and more from Apple devices to your smart TV.

Works with: Amazon Alexa and Apple HomeKit – Press and hold the voice button and ask Alexa to easily find, launch, and control content, and more. You can also use Airplay to share videos, photos and music, and more from your compatible iPhone or iPad.
body.description: TCL S Class Smart TVs offer stunning 4K HDR picture quality with four times the resolution of Full HD for enhanced clarity and detail, all wrapped together in an elegant edge-to-edge FullView metal bezel-less design blending seamlessly into any home. HDR PRO delivers bright and accurate colors for a lifelike viewing experience with support for Dolby Vision, HDR10, and HLG. TCL S Class TVs are more than just a Smart TV but a Smart Choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very good in every way.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace a 50" vizio smart tv that picture was failing on. Love the fire tv and the included alexa. Color is great and setup was a breeze. Some said the build felt cheap to them - guess I DON'T know the difference in cheap plastic and good plastic - besides I really don't sit around feeling the build quality.Price was really good and features are good. The remote is user friendly as is the os. I REALLY DO RECOMEND THIS TV.Had a small problem with the sound on one channel which was odd as all other channels were fine. Called their help line and customer service walked me thru a very easy fix. Still a 5 star and will include customer service in the rating.HAVE had this TCL TV for one month and I find it better than our 65" SONY, better picture, color, sharpness just better all the way around. The one thing it lacks is a lot of color adjustments, but out of the box it really didn't need any and if I could adjust the settings I would probably screw it up. Just buy it! UPDATE: 3 months and still very satisfied with the purchase. I did notice that one person had trouble with the optical port in hooking up his sound bar. The best way to hook up the sound bar is to use the HDMI e arc port and it works great. I have never tried the on board speakers as I am extremely satisfied with the sound bar. Will update in six months. UPDATE; Small problem due to internet going down for close to a day. When it came back on I had all smart functions. but all cable channels were gone and it was easy getting them back, but they would not open. I called TCL help line and they worked me thru the problem, but did have to reset the tv by unplugging it-waiting for a bit then plugging it in again. All was well then and I DON'T KNOW WHY, BUT THE PICTURE SEEMS TO BE EVEN BETTER THAN BEFORE. Help line was very good and sayed with this 91 year old until all was fixed'

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent flatscreen TV
reviews.reviewText: This is a secondary unit placed in a home office and it’s used almost every day. The picture is quite sharp, excellent quality, bright colors and very good contrast, right out of the box, no additional adjustments were done. The sound, on the other hand, because of the smaller speakers, is a bit of the weaker side, requiring a higher adjustment, but once that is done, it sounds good and intelligible. The setup was quite easy, in just a few minutes being able to connect to the internet and getting access to all my favorite apps. The remote strongly resembles the one used by the Amazon stick and the TV is Alexa friendly. I haven’t tested that feature yet because I prefer to look for my own favorite apps and movies. The unit is quite light, easy to move around and the supporting plastic stands were very easy to install. Overall I am very happy with this TV and I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Arrived before expected packaged well. No damage. Was hard to find the holes for wall mount...finally saw them amost on the bottom. So beware. Got it wall mounted and the mount shows on the bottom as the holes are so close to the bottom on the rear. Usually the wall mount holes are in the middle. So if you're going to mount on an existing one, beware. The set up was very easy. Turned on and it was already set up for our Amazon account. That was nice. Download and installation of apps was easy. Within an hour all was complete and was operating just like our old one. The picture quality is good....but we're not fussy. Some would say it could be better but at this price point I can say it was as good a picture as the one we replaced that was much pricier and died after only 4 years. The sound is better than our old one as well. I like that the remote is the same as the one we had for our fire stick, which we no longer need. Overall, I've very happy with this TV and the entire transaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My tv arrived today packaging was good tv was in perfect condition no scratches works perfectly. Picture quality is good for the price of the TV. I'm a gamer and the quality of the picture for my games is amazing. Connected my Bluetooth sound bar effortlessly. I've had no issues laoding and updating my fire TV. Overall im pleased with the TV I purchased. Only thing I will say is it's not OLED which was my last tv before I upgraded to the 75 inch TCL but I can deal with not having OLED. I like the fact that I can adjust the color and picture settings. Internal speakers could be better. My soundbar makes my tv sound like a theater.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good TV for Xbox series x
reviews.reviewText: I replaced a 39" 1080p LED tv with this 43" 4k Fire TV. I like this TV very much. I stream shows from multiple apps on my Roku, but now I don't need the Roku because this TV has all the same apps I was using. I mainly game on this TV on an Xbox series X. There are many settings available and there is an auto gaming mode that is enabled while gaming(a little icon pops up saying it's going into gaming mode). Many settings are the same type you'd find on any brand of TV, but this has some settings that were new to me. You can set the TV speakers to automatically apply a Dolby Atmos effect which surprisingly sounds decent on the small TV speakers. Dolby Vision HDR looks great on games that support it which there are many. For the price I paid for this TV I am surprised how good this TV is and how much I like it. The TV speakers really are good enough to use on their own(No bass, good vocal audio, decent all around), I did connect the TV via Bluetooth to my stereo amplifier which is connected to Kef speakers and a subwoofer, Bluetooth sounds excellent on this TV. If you get this TV and plan to game on it with an Xbox Series X, don't forget to adjust some of the settings on the XBOX to make sure 4k is enabled, Dolby Vision is enabled and the correct Stereo, Dolby Digital or Dolby Atmos is enabled for your sound system. On my stereo speaker only setup, Dolby Digital sounds best while gaming on XBOX.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got this on black friday, Love it!
reviews.reviewText: This TV is a no-brainer. Such a great value for the price. Easy to hang up on the universal mount I bought.TV has a gorgeous picture and good sound right out the box. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing picture quality
reviews.reviewText: The is one of the best TVs I have ever owned. The picture is sharp and crisp. The Operating system can be a little annoying but has great functionality. If you own an Amazon Echo, this TV is compatible with Home Studio and Voice operations. A great TV for the price
